sentences.en: Her allusive style is difficult to follow.
sentences.cn: 她引经据典的风格晦涩难懂.

sentences.en: His new play, Arcadia, is as intricate, elaborate and allusive as anything he has yet written.
sentences.cn: 他的新剧《阿卡迪亚》和他写过的任何作品一样，错综复杂、构思精巧并且富含典故。

sentences.en: Perhaps blue eyelashes are this allusive sign , virginal behavior this fragile allusion.
sentences.cn: 可能,蓝色眼睫就是挑逗,静若处女就是似有若无的撩拨.

sentences.en: The young schoolboy can not understand the allusive conversation of intellectual men.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻的学生听不懂文人们引经据典的谈话.

words.tran_cn: 暗指，转弯抹角地说到；略为提及，顺便提到

trans.tran_en: Allusive speech, writing, or art is full of indirect references to people or things
